title: Looking for people to write articles about certain cards
author: mmync

posts.post_title: Looking for people to write articles about certain cards
posts.post_content:
Hey everybody,

I would like to create a blog for all of the cards listed below. If you have passion for any of these cards, and would like to write an article about it, I would love to use your article to officially launch the blog. I will also put a link in the blog that will take people directly to your eBay store or set registry. Since I will be posting this in a few of the other forums, please email me directly if you are interested. My email address is [url]mmync@hotmail.com[/url]

Happy Collecting,
Mike
